headline.print_headline: Penguins Rally for Win Behind Star’s Hat Trick; Sharks Edge Wild on a Late Goal
headline.main: Penguins Rally for Win Behind Star’s Hat Trick; Sharks Edge Wild on a Late Goal

snippet: Evgeni Malkin scored a hat trick to help the Penguins defeat the Vancouver Canucks, 5-4, on Saturday in Pittsburgh.
lead_paragraph: Evgeni Malkin scored a hat trick to help the Penguins defeat the Vancouver Canucks, 5-4, on Saturday in Pittsburgh.
